parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The image contains a COD AEP: 13240004.  While not explicitly labeled "CMF," this is a code assigned by the Romanian electoral authority (Autoritatea Electorală Permanentă - AEP) and serves the same purpose as a CMF number, indicating official electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post clearly refers to Petru Farago, identifying him as a candidate for the Chamber of Deputies, in position 1 on the ballot.  The logo of the UDMR (Uniunea Democrată Maghiară din România) is prominently displayed, further solidifying the connection to a specific candidate and party participating in the parliamentary elections.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The targeting data shows a significant reach across multiple locations in Arad County, Romania.  The content is not a private message but public advertising.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to promote Petru Farago's candidacy. By highlighting his position on the ballot (Position 1), the post directly encourages voters to vote for him. The visual nature of the post, featuring Farago's image and party logo, further reinforces this electoral objective.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present information in a journalistic manner. It lacks any form of news reporting, analysis, or opinion. Instead, it is purely promotional, focusing solely on advocating for a specific candidate.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express a personal opinion; it is a clear and direct endorsement of a candidate for the parliamentary elections.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1631706347773457</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers directly to a candidate (Petru Farago), is used during the electoral campaign period (although the exact end date is not specified, the post's metadata suggests it was active during the campaign), has a clear electoral objective (to increase votes for Farago), and is targeted at the general public via a paid Facebook advertisement. The presence of the AEP code further confirms its nature as official electoral propaganda.  The post's design and content are not journalistic or educational; they are purely promotional.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>PETRU FARAGO</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>UDMR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
SC KLING CONSULTING SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 1631706347773457) cu scop electoral, care promovează candidatura lui PETRU FARAGO pentru Camera Deputaților,  utilizând imaginea acestuia și sigla UDMR,  precum și codul AEP 13240004,  având un efect electoral pozitiv asupra candidaturii sale. Postarea, plătită cu o sumă sub 100 RON, a generat între 3000 și 4000 de impresii și a avut o estimare a acoperirii de 10.000 - 50.000 de persoane.  Informațiile de contact ale advertiserului sunt: bold.barbara98@gmail.com și +40759828198, cu adresa Episcopiei, 32, Arad, Arad 310084, RO și website-ul https://www.facebook.com/rmdszarad/.  Această postare constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea campaniei electorale, conform legislației în vigoare.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
